channel.title: Corrupt a Wish | ToL Forum Edition
channel.description:
One person wishes, the next person corrupts their wish in any way they want. Then they make a wish after the corruption.
Example: Bob: I wish for a car David: Wish granted but you got into a car crash while driving around Canada. I wish for a horse
and so forth.
I'll start: I wish Firekitten would be quiet sometimes.

item.title: Corrupt a Wish | ToL Forum Edition
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Granted but the something else is to destroy all of space and time

Read full topic

item.description:
(Forgot what thread this was SOOO)

Wish granted but now you float up in the sky never reaching the ground. dying to suffocation.

I wish I had something that allowed me to alter space time and something else.

item.title: Corrupt a Wish | ToL Forum Edition
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Simon:

i wish i could stop time for everyone else while i sleep so no time actually passes

Wish granted but you explode when time resumes due to friction and basic force = distance/time calculations.

I wish I could send my mind into my past selves body and replace his mind in the process and that I could do this unlimited times and go back in time as far or not far as I want

Read full topic
